pullRequest.title: Do not run database migration for server in standby
pullRequest.bodyText:
After moving to liquibase, as part of database upgrade
liquibase tries to update the 'databasechangeloglock' table to
take a lock. While using Business Continuity, this update fails on
the secondary server running in a standby mode which is connected
to a database which is configured to be in standby mode as well.
This commit ensures a db migration is not run on a server in standby.
When using business continuity, the database replication should take
care of syncing migrations from primary to secondary db.
